readme.ide: NetBeans 7.3.1 with GNU C++ Compiler on Ubuntu Linux 12.04
readme.definition: The ObjectiveMedia project is a dynamic library meant to provide platform-specific functionality for accessing media devices such as video input devices and audio input and output devices. It also provides video and audio codec support.
